186030765.review: Fantastická adventura (resp. únikovka) s hezkým příběhem a ovládáním, které vytváří skutečný dojem z mechanických strojů.

186022509.review: 游戏是好游戏，就是转管道转不过去，每次鼠标都要重新拖，血压高了

185949734.review: Magnifique à voir et à faire.

185939856.review: Очень неплохо, но не без досадных огрехов: есть ошибки в разгадках и система подсказок, на мой вкус, сделана довольно ущербно, можно было бы сильно улучшить. Игру лучше приобрести на скидках, чтобы скоротать пару вечеров над головоломками, без скидок - по впечатлениям от игры цена скорее завышена.

185914872.review: Fantastic game for those people who like puzzles. Enjoyed this one greatly.

185900254.review:
I've played all the parts of "The Room" and I already had a certain attitude towards such games. I didn't expect much, though.

Some of the puzzles are easy and some are difficult, but the implementation is really well done, I also like the DaVinci setting. Many things are similar to "The Room", most of the time I wondered if they weren't the same developers, crazy.

The camera controls are OK, but sometimes you click around like a madman to find that one pixel that lets you move on, but all in all a good puzzle game.

185897946.review: I really like this game. I'm an old game player. A Sierra game player for many years. I was looking for a game that can get you thinking, this is is! Puzzles are fun and different, some are hard, but most are solveable without hitting up the walkthrough. The only gripe I have is double clicking is a pain and sometimes are delayed as you click. all in all a really nice game. Older players will enjoy  this one.

185897832.review: Durchgespielt, und es macht Spaß ! Rätsel sind manchmal schwer, aber das Spiel gibt einem mehrere Tipps und somit kommt man immer auf die Lösung des Rätsels. Hat viel Spaß gemacht!

185842026.review:
クリアまで7時間かからないくらい。ヒントもあるためクリアにつまることはないとおもいます。楽しかった。

ただ操作性がとてもとても悪いためいやな気分になるかもしれません。２５００円で買うとプレイ時間とのギャップ、操作性の悪さからくるストレスで悲しくなるかも。
セールなら買い。

185751825.review: Un jeu comme je les aime. Graphique intéressant.

185698063.review: Nice challenging puzzles, da vinci would be proud! (▀̿Ĺ̯▀̿ ̿)

185696434.review:
Very disappointed by this game. The price is still kind of high after a few years and the reviews are very good so I was expecting better. 

It's not a bad game where you get bored, but it's not a good game either. Puzzles are very straightforward, when you find a new item you know immediately where to use it and how to move forward. I'm not saying a puzzle game has to be ambiguous to be good, but if you compare to the Room series, you can't but admit the feeling of discovering things is not so good.

Nice to spend a little bit of time but nothing spectacular.

185689751.review:
This game gave me carpal tunnel from spamming every pixel in every room to find 'hidden' puzzles. Also not being able to use items unless you are 'zoomed' correctly is bad design and annoying because it makes you think something doesn't work when in fact it does. So much wasted time trying endless combos.
A 5 out of 10

185384030.review: I liked this game, it kept me guessing, all the time.  I don't like that I died at the end.  But on to part 2.

185371335.review:
"The House of Da Vinci" is a puzzle game that aims to attract fans of logic challenges and Renaissance atmospheres. Developed by Blue Brain Games, it promises an immersive experience by transporting players to the world of Leonardo da Vinci and his creative contraptions.

Positive Points:

The game impresses with its well-crafted visuals. The graphics capture the essence of the Renaissance with details in the machines, environments and works of art. The soundtrack complements the mysterious atmosphere, helping with immersion. In addition, the puzzles present good variety and demand attention to detail, which may please those who enjoy challenging games.

Negative Points:

Despite the well-crafted atmosphere, the plot lacks depth. Although the idea of exploring Da Vinci's world is interesting, the main story is shallow and not very engaging, leaving the feeling that it could have been better developed.  Furthermore, the learning curve of the puzzles is not very balanced, with some challenges being intuitive and others frustratingly obtuse, which can hinder the game's fluidity.

Another point that can be discouraging is the limited interaction with the environment. Despite the visual richness, exploration is restricted, and the game becomes linear over time. The lack of more varied mechanics makes the experience repetitive in some parts.

Verdict:

"The House of Da Vinci" is a visually appealing experience with interesting moments for puzzle fans, but it fails to explore the full narrative and interactive potential of its premise. It is a valid choice for those seeking intellectual challenges, but not for those who prioritize an engaging narrative or more dynamic gameplay.

185285541.review: Juego que engancha...algunos puzles son bastante difíciles, pero crea adicción.

185277055.review: it is sometimes difficult to connect the clues but the ambiance of the game is superb. I love it.

185252878.review:
This wants to be like "The Room" games but fails in many ways, some of the puzzles are pure guess work, no logic clear path so you are forced to use brute force sometimes. Don't waste your time on this knock-off garbage, play "The Room" series, the puzzles make you think but there is "always" some logic to figure them out.

For instance one of the puzzles in this game is a series of numbers you must order, this being Da Vinci a Fibonacci sequence seems like the path you should take but since the proper sequence cannot be completed with the numbers provided to you in game you move on (i.e. waste your time) but guess what? the answer is the Fibonacci sequence, an incorrect, wrong broken one. You have to build it without two of the main starting numbers....  does the dev even know what a Fibonacci sequence is? 0,1,1,2,3,5,8,13 is the correct answer not the one your are forced to provide.

This game will just frustrate you, even if you find all the clues some puzzles are just stupid random garbage that are designed not to test your brain but your willingness to try every sequence/pattern possible to solve it with dumb luck, just the opposite of what is supposed to be in puzzle games.

185197483.review: Игра отличная, 10/10, загадки вполне логически решаемые, понравилось наличие загадки в загадке (сборка предметов до нужной кондиции), атмосферная музыка очень хороша. Рекомендую!

185194852.review: Un jeu interactif et vraiment parfait avec des énigmes qui demandent beaucoup de réflexion . Je le recommande à tout point de vue

185148902.review: Love the puzzles and the mystery of trying to figure things out.  Love that it's not timed, so I can think through each puzzle.  Love that you get better and better as you play.  The graphics are beautiful.

185129893.review: What an amazing and unique experience, I will be playing the 2 and 3 ones for sure when I get the chance, 10/10 Da Vincis

185110928.review: Easily one of my new favorite games. The game is full of easily solvable as well as more advanced puzzles, and the hints are mostly very helpful. (There are times when even the hint can't help the situation, and I spent an unreasonable amount of time with a relatively simple puzzle - but nothing unsolvable). The game is also very good at storytelling and the visuals are peak in my opinion.

A great combination of logical thinking and puzzle skills. One really has to use all your brain for this game..
the hint function does come to ones rescue quite often.

184928558.review:
More frustration than fun.

I'm coming to this game having played The Room series of games, and this does not measure up in the slightest.

First of all you are expected to double click on things to zoom or move to them but there is no indication of what you can/can't click on so you spend your time randomly double clicking on parts of the screen.

Secondly, a lot of the puzzles are just unituitive and don't make sense. I had to resort to using the hints many many times, but sometimes even the hints didn't make sense.

As I got more frustrated with the game I used the hints more and more to try to get through it but eventually I didn't even bother finishing the last chapter because it just wasn't fun anymore.

184905070.review:
The controls were unintuitive, the puzzles were frequently unclear, i was unsure where I should be moving/clicking or where i *could* be clicking.

Purchase this game if you enjoy awkwardly designed badly-plotted rube goldberg machines!

184716347.review: I guess it scratches the itch for the short time it takes to beat it (first run through was a little over 3.5 hours without hints). Recommend buying during a sale if at all. 75% of the gameplay is just retracing steps to find the tiny latch you missed after picking up an item 10 steps ago. Slightly less linear progression than The Room, but more of a hassle to find what you need. If you really want to have a good puzzle game with a compelling story and puzzles that take more than just brute force, play the Myst series. If you want to kill some time, I suppose this is one way to do that. Not recommended for puzzle game veterans.

184479544.review:
[h1] Guter Puzzle-Einstieg auf den Spuren Da Vincis[/h1]
Mir hat [i] The House of Da Vinci [/i] gefallen. Es ist durch das Tipp-System auch gut für Anfänger im Puzzle-Genre geeignet, obwohl es gegen Ende doch schon recht knackig für mich wurde. Generell sollte genau hingeschaut werden, sonst verpasst man leicht etwas und dies kann dann auch mal schnell frustrierend werden.

Die Konstruktionen und darin enthaltenen Rätsel beeindrucken und haben mich das eine oder andere Mal staunen lassen. Gleichermaßen gelungen finde ich die Animationen, die beim Anschauen Spaß machen. 

Die Geschichte nimmt eine Hintergrundrolle ein und wird durch kurze Texte und Kommentare des Protagonisten erzählt. Dennoch versorgte sie mich mit genügend Informationen, um den Zweck meiner Bemühungen zu erkennen und zu motivieren.

Alles in allem habe ich das Spiel innerhalb meiner gut 10 Stunden Spielzeit genossen und empfehle ein Abtauchen in die Welt Leonardo Da Vincis zu wagen.

184464285.review: Es un juego muy poco intuitivo. Si no vas con MUCHA calma o viendo un walkthrough mientras juegas, no lo recomiendo. Terminaré el juego, pero no lo estoy disfrutando precisamente, a diferencia de "The room" (Juego del mismo género)

184456174.review: This game is trying so hard to be The Room and it fails horribly, The movement is much clunkier and puzzles are awful. This game is like an old point and click hidden picture game because all your gonna be doing in clicking everything you see. This game has a huge lack of direction and expects you too just know where and what your doing. This is the worst fps puzzle game i have ever played. Plz save yourself the money and buy The Room Trilogy.

184454860.review: Un juego muy  bien hecho, con puzzles muy entretenidos y nada simples, que te dará muchas horas de entretenimiento si no recurres a las pistas, porque muchas de las cosas están bastante bien escondidas y tienes que pulsar en cada punto de la imagen hasta dar con ellas. Además no se trata solo de abrir cajas, tiene una historia que lo acompaña y te llena de curiosidad. Sin duda jugaré a las siguientes entregas.

达芬奇的密室，传统的点击式解谜，最大的难点是找不到下个谜题要点哪开启；
和未上锁的房间相比，机械结构更贴近现实，没有虚空元素（克系元素）的奇思妙想；
相对的，由于模型碰撞的原因，移动物品的时候如果没有移动到位，就会干扰其他物品的移动，有点火大，看在老游戏的份上就不计较了；
喜欢点击式解谜、密室逃脱类游戏的推荐一玩，整个系列都可以尝试一下

184367773.review: The controls are horrible and not user friendly. It is so frustrating, that i decided to stop playing the game

184165901.review:
Сейчас, при прохождении, особенно в начале, не покидает отчетливое ощущение, что играть ощутимо устарела. Увидев 2017 год релиза я изрядно удивился, но, полагаю, тут дело в, вероятно, маленькой команде разработки. В прочем, это не бегалка-стрелялка или рпг, что бы делать акцент на графику. В процессе же прохождения на это все вообще перестаешь обращать внимание. 
Что касательно основной головоломной составляющей... У меня ощутимо костное мышление, прямое как палка, но я, тем не менее, очень люблю головоломки, хотя и не совсем могу. Игра милостиво кормила меня подсказками, где я застревал, так что прохождение удалось. Однако, пару раз пришлось сходить на ютуб и тупо посмотреть, как это делают другие люди. 
В общем, отлично. Ни о чем не жалею, купил сразу две оставшиеся части, буду тупить с удовольствием дальше.

184098993.review: as a lover of puzzle game series like "room" the game is not bad but also not good at all. some of the puzzles are so unnecesary and sometimes you just dont have any clue where to go until you get hint from game. game flow is just not there sometimes. but if you looking for some puzzle game you may give it a try.

184049269.review:
I absolutely love this game! This is like a series of virtual escape rooms. Both the puzzles (excluding the last level!) and the overall atmosphere are interesting and really intricate at times.

Don't go into the first game expecting it to have all the bells and whistles, but it's so worth playing the series from the start! The visuals are really quite nice and it should be good fun for 4 to 8 hours depending on how quickly you want to race through. 

As always with these kinda games, my advice is to have a guide ready and only use it if you're really stuck to prevent you from getting frustrated if you aren't able to figure out the game's logic at all times :)

183902394.review: A great and charming fiddly puzzle adventure following in the footsteps of The Room series, if a bit clunkier at times. Definitely worth the hours if you enjoy puzzle boxes with intricate sliding mechanisms. So many mechanisms and gizmos.

183742147.review: Leuk spel, soms irritant met terug gaan door klikken maar dat ligt meer aan mij dan het spel.

183695775.review: On est scotché, beau graphisme et des énigmes stimulantes. La maniabilité est parfois un peux pénible mais n'étant pas un jeu d'action cela ne représente pas un réel handicap-

183686188.review: В целом не плохо, но управление очень вязкое и не отзывчивое. Продолжительные анимации и переходы, нет чёткого понимания с чем можно взаимодействовать, приходится закликивать всю сцену. До этого проходил схожий Room, и та игра показалась тактильней.

183658151.review: I keep finding more puzzles to solve! Very challenging, but if you choose to take a hint, it really nudges, but doesn't tell you straight out the answer.

183648652.review:
Вітаю всіх з Різдвом!

В цей святковий день ми ставимо палець догори грі The House of Da Vinci. Це перша частина однойменної серії ігор, в якій ми починаємо свою пригоду з загадками самого Леонардо Да Вінчі. Гра має мінімальний сюжет, де Да Вінчі скеровує нас через серію записок та листів котрі він залишає, поступово розкриваючи, що саме відбувається в даний момент і що нам потрібно робити, здебільшого без конкретики, але все ж. 

Ми ж в свою чергу просуваємось локаціями де розгадуємо різноманітні загадки котрі сконструював мейстер. Щодо загадок, то вони бувають бентежними та подекуди незрозумілими. Я б охарактеризував їх на середній рівень цікавості та складності. Гра робить нахил більше в сторону історичних приладів та винаходів які Леонардо творив за часів свого життя.

В якості бонусу, в гру додано окрему кімнату з деякими творіннями та концепціями Да Вінчі, де ми можемо прочитати опис та задумку, а також "погратись" з мініатюрними моделями його ідей.

В цілому - оцінюю гру на твердого середняка та рекомендую для проходження любителям загадок.

183643217.review: bulmaca çözmeyi seven herkese bu oyunu tavsiye ediyorum. Bazı şifreleri yardımlarla çözsem de mükemmel bir oyundu. Tek kelime ile bayıldım. Bulmacalar, şifreler sizi yıldırmasın. Pes etmeyin ve mutlaka oynamaya devam edin. Bütün oyun detaylarda gizli. Oyunun grafikleri,detayları,şifreler,mekanik parçaları hepsi çok detaylıydı. Oyunu hazırlayan bütün ekibe teşekkürler.

183607568.review: Excellent jeu de réflexion, les énigmes deviennent plus difficile au fil de l'aventure mais l'histoire est très intéressante et ça vaut le coup de chercher à résoudre tous les puzzles
